requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version API Trace

data.title: Create and publish offer version API Trace
data.bodyText:
{
  "stepKey": "owner-create-offer-version",
  "callCount": 1,
  "calls": [
    {
      "method": "POST",
      "path": "/api/v1/bizes/3A8CaA2ofDq7FQZYkHU0gjlmZr0/offers/offer_3A8CaSHTe3kxNFSGcDsZha1UYPa/versions",
      "status": 201,
      "requestBody": {
        "version": 1,
        "status": "published",
        "durationMode": "fixed",
        "defaultDurationMin": 50,
        "basePriceMinor": 15000,
        "currency": "USD"
      },
      "responseBody": {
        "success": true,
        "data": {
          "id": "offer_version_3A8CadCr10kTtTEAQNPzTTc4cxf",

          "retireAt": null,

        },

        }

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Custom Labeling for Execution Modes. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.title: Create resources representing hosts/assets/venues Snapshot
